verbose_text: Upregulation of these pathways is largely influenced by beta hydroxybutyrylation of the histone residue H3K9 [XREF_BIBR], which is also involved in the upregulation of antioxidant defense through BHB induced HDAC inhibition [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: histone residue H3K9 [ XREF_BIBR ], which is also involved in the upregulation of antioxidant defense through BHB-induced HDAC
